name: Bullet Hell Game (Cameron G)
description:
This was the first game that I worked with a team to create. the team consisted of 3 programmers and the game was created in unity using C# scripting.

My role within the team was to create the core mechanics for the player such as the movement and shooting implementations other team members were responsible for creating the shooting patterns of the enemies and powerups for the player. I was also responsible for all of the UI in the game. 

Known issues:

  • the shield powerup is not fully implemented
  • the main menu is outdated
  • the options menu UI does not update to fit resolutions other then 1080p
